movie.title: Shark School
movie.description_intro: Two young fish, love to attend fish school each and every day! They learn along with their beloved teacher, who shows them the way! Fish School is fun and educational experience for kids of all ages!
movie.description_full: Two young fish, love to attend fish school each and every day! They learn along with their beloved teacher, who shows them the way! Fish School is fun and educational experience for kids of all ages!

movies.title: The Magic School Bus Rides Again: The Frizz Connection
movies.title_english: The Magic School Bus Rides Again: The Frizz Connection
movies.title_long: The Magic School Bus Rides Again: The Frizz Connection (2020)
movies.summary: A lightning separates the Magic School Bus into three pieces, scattering the class across the globe with different versions of Ms. Frizzle aboard each bus.
movies.description_full: A lightning separates the Magic School Bus into three pieces, scattering the class across the globe with different versions of Ms. Frizzle aboard each bus.
movies.synopsis: A lightning separates the Magic School Bus into three pieces, scattering the class across the globe with different versions of Ms. Frizzle aboard each bus.

movies.title: He Got Game
movies.summary: Tells the story of Jesus Shuttlesworth, the most sought after high school basketball prospect in the nation. Jesus and his dream to make it to the big ranks in professional basketball are overshadowed by his father, Jake, who is spending his life in prison for killing Jesus' mother.
movies.description_full: Tells the story of Jesus Shuttlesworth, the most sought after high school basketball prospect in the nation. Jesus and his dream to make it to the big ranks in professional basketball are overshadowed by his father, Jake, who is spending his life in prison for killing Jesus' mother.
movies.synopsis: Tells the story of Jesus Shuttlesworth, the most sought after high school basketball prospect in the nation. movies.title: Chop Chop
movies.summary: A night of chaos ensues when a murderous psychopath targets a loving young couple who might be harboring a secret of their own.
movies.description_full: A night of chaos ensues when a murderous psychopath targets a loving young couple who might be harboring a secret of their own.
movies.synopsis: A night of chaos ensues when a murderous psychopath targets a loving young couple who might be harboring a secret of their own.

movies.title: Inescapable
movies.summary: One afternoon, on a typical day at work, Adib is confronted with devastating news: His eldest daughter, Muna, has gone missing in Damascus. Now Adib, who has not been back in over 20 years, must return to Syria and deal with his secret past in order to find her. "Inescapable" is a thriller about a father's desperate search for his daughter and the chaos of the Middle East he left behind.

"Inescapable" is a thriller about a father's desperate search for his daughter and the chaos of the Middle East he left behind.
